greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-2) + a(n-6) - a(n-8) with n>8, the first eight terms are 0 except that for a(5) = a(7) = 1.
comment: Sequence related to A264041 (1 is the offset of A264041).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,0,0,0,1,0,-1).
maple: with(numtheory): P:= proc(q) local n; for n from 0 to q do
print((1-(-1)^n)*floor(n/6+1/3)/2); od; end: P(100); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Nov 12 2015
xref: Cf. A000004 (second bisection), A000217, A002264 (for the first bisection), A264041.
results.author: _Jean-François Alcover_ and _Paul Curtz_, Nov 09 2015
